div.title: Student working on math with ipad

span.span: Welcome to the Chelsea School District.

In partnership with our community stakeholders, the Chelsea School District will prepare students to possess the skills to communicate effectively, express themselves creatively, think critically and work collaboratively to maximize their potential and meet the challenges of a global society.

div.p: This site provides information using PDF, visit this link to download the Adobe Acrobat Reader DC software.

h1.em: Empowering Students. Engaging Minds. Exploring Possibilities

img.alt: District Spotlight - Photo of Chelsea School District faculty

div.p: Loren has served the students of Chelsea for many years as a teacher and coach. He consistently leads our Math department with passion, energy and creative ideas which has helped produce a successful middle school CPM Math experience. Our students perform well in his Algebra and Math 8 courses but it is Loren’s efforts with our most struggling students where he shines. Loren’s ILH class has helped hundreds of students over the years get back on track. Students build efficacy and confidence in their skills under his tutelage. His dedication to the middle school philosophy is evident and Beach is a better place because of his efforts. --Nick Angel

div.style: background-image: url('/themes/Brixton/images/section-bg-classroom-1320x680.jpg'); background-size: cover; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center;

div.p: The Chelsea School District continually exceeds a 95% graduation rate, leading the county and state graduation rates year after year. Chelsea schools are enriching and safe places for children to learn and grow.
